description.value:
Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons. Choose one 3rd-rank spell and one 4th-rank spell from those listed for a dragon spellcaster of your draconic exemplar's type (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Paralyze] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stinking Cloud] for a black dragon exemplar).

You can cast each of these spells once per day as arcane innate spells.
